metadata.title: CVE-2024-36945 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/smc: fix neighbour and rtable leak in smc_ib_find_route()In smc_ib_find_route(), the neighbour found by neigh_lookup() and rtableresolved by ip_route_output_flow() are not released or put before return.It may cause the refcount leak, so fix it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
